name: Disconsolate
storyline:
You play as George Blackwin, a young, small-time journalist, who hears about strange occurrences taking place in an old hospital that was shut down 30 years ago, due to a murder case that has been shrouded in mystery since. He ventures a few cities down, and gets locked in said hospital, unable to get out through the main exit. He drops his current assignment of getting a story for his newspaper, and focuses on one thing: Getting the hell out of this place. 
 
-- 
 
However, the hospital is abandoned and empty. Nobody has entered it for 30 years. Blackwin is alone, stuck in an old, dark hospital. At least, it seems you are.
summary: A short, pixel-based horror game about a small-time journalist and his ambitions to get a good news story, even if that means heading to a hospital that's been closed for 30 years...
